metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Florence. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Janelle Walters, CFPÂ®

heroDescription: Florence, SC, is a growing city known for its rich history and vibrant community.
landscapeDescription: Florence's economy is diverse, with significant contributions from healthcare, manufacturing, and retail. The city is strategically located along major highways, enhancing its logistical advantages.
uniqueNeeds: Florence requires tailored financial services to address its unique economic landscape and demographic shifts.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Florence's reliance on healthcare and retail poses economic risks; housing market volatility and flooding concerns necessitate diversification and prudent investment strategies.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Florence's economy has shown steady growth, driven by healthcare and retail sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Florence is $48,000, reflecting local economic conditions.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Florence are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and investment management.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Florence's cost of living is lower than the national average, making it an attractive place to live.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the real estate market in Florence is experiencing moderate growth, but affordability remains a concern.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Florence's business climate is favorable for small businesses, with supportive local policies.
